overview: Saktinath lives with his wife, two sons and a daughter in a North Kolkata house which was gifted to him by his eldest Son, Bitan, who lives in the USA. Bitan has a family of his own, a wife and a beautiful daughter, Elisa.  Just after the announcement of Saktinath`s only daughter`s marriage, the family came to know of Bitan`s passing due to stage III Cancer. Saktinath couldn`t do but mortgage his house as nobody else in family could help in no way, Bidhan was freshly recruited, and Biplab, a Collegian. After two years, Bidhan got married to Aparna, a schoolteacher in South Kolkata. Biplab also got engaged with Riya, an excellent Classical singer.
title: 9 No. Peara Bagan Lane
